act_info.full_title: Hindu Heritage Month Act, 2016, S.O. 2016, c. 35
act_info.citation: Hindu Heritage Month Act, 2016, S.O. 2016, c. 35

content.content: 1. The month of November in each year is proclaimed as Hindu Heritage Month. 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Act). 3. Omitted (enacts short title of this Act). ______________  Français
content.raw_html:
1. The month of November in each year is proclaimed as Hindu Heritage Month.

2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Act).

3. Omitted (enacts short title of this Act).

______________
